distribution.text: Copyright 2023 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for libxml2 fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2017-8872: Out-of-bounds read could lead to application crash (bsc#1038444)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: The htmlParseTryOrFinish function in HTMLparser.c in libxml2 2.9.4 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (buffer over-read) or information disclosure.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
